title: Bandwidth: GeForce Now hits 1,300 supported games
content:
This latest slew of games from GeForce Now marks a total of 1300 games supported to the streaming service. The title that marks this record for GeForce Now is Evil Dead: The Game, which will be available today on release.

moreâ€¦

The post Bandwidth: GeForce Now hits 1,300 supported games appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: GeForce Now hits 1300 games supported with the service this week with Evil Dead: The Game. Xbox Game Pass gets in on the action, too.
